thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-China Everbright Bank Elects Chairman, Plans 3.44 Bln Yuan Fixed Assets Investment In 2018

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Everbright Bank Elects Chairman, Plans 3.44 Bln Yuan Fixed Assets Investment In 2018

organizations.name: reuters) - china everbright bank co ltd

text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - China Everbright Bank Co Ltd :
* SAYS BOARD ELECTS LI XIAOPENG AS CHAIRMAN * SAYS BOARD APPROVES FIXED ASSETS INVESTMENT OF 3.44 BILLION YUAN ($544.03 million) IN 2018 Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2CoDMmU Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3232 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
